name: Infinite Children
description:
Infinite Children is a science fiction audiobook video game about life extension. You play as members of a family questing for life extension treatments for their children - the great inheritance innovation of the age. Long-dead relatives as well as yet-to-be-born descendants alike send you messages through time, hoping to shape your way. In this American dream about the fear of being left behind, you will choose to give your child a very long life.

**Infinite Children is currently short and too fast because the community has not earned enough achievements required to fully extend the game.**
